effects: Increase power of the next normal attack (+2.5x, max +10x)
Restore 50 MP to the rest of the party
Reduce damage taken by 30% to all allies for 3 turns
name: Invigorating Dance+

desc_short: Restore MP for all allies except self and reduce damage taken for all allies for three turns and boost next normal attack
恢復除自己以外全體隊員的MP+3回合內減少對全體隊員的傷害+提高下一回合普通攻擊的威力
사용자를 제외한 아군 전체의 MP 회복+3턴 동안 아군 전체가 받는 피해량 감소+다음 턴에 일반 공격 위력 상승
Restaure PM des alliés sauf ceux du lanceur, réduit les dégâts subis par tous les alliés pendant trois tours et augmente l'attaque normale au tour suivant.
Regeneriert MP aller Verbündeten, aber nicht eigene, verringert drei Runden lang von allen Verb. erhaltenen Schaden und erhöht den nächsten normalen Angriff.
Recupera PM de aliados menos el usuario, reduce el daño que reciben los aliados durante 3 turnos y potencia el próximo ataque normal
